examples.message: There’s a campus-wide network issue affecting connectivity. As a result, the Yens are down until further notice. Please join our Slack Channel or the Yens Announcement email list for further updates.

The Data, Analytics, and Research Computing (DARC) team will be observing the Thanksgiving holiday from the afternoon of Wednesday, November 27 through Friday, November 29, returning Monday, December 2nd.
☃️ Winter Closure ☃️ Dec. 21, 2024 – Jan. 5, 2025. DARC support unavailable during this period. The Yens remain accessible. For major outages, contact srcc-support@stanford.edu.
The Yen servers are scheduled for a routine reboot next Thursday, January 23, 2025.
The issues with JupyterHub have been resolved. Please visit the Status page or join our Slack channel to be informed of any server status changes.
